description: Athletic, boyish Michael Del Ray has been going crazy since his new stepdad, beefy Bruce Beckham, moved in. He can’t get any kind of peace in the house since the newlyweds are constantly having loud sex. It does not get any better when he accidentally catches a peek of the handsome stud’s massive, cut cock. Now all he can do is fantasize about it all day, and it won’t get any better until he’s being pumped full of it deep in his ass. Brown-haired Michael is left home alone with Bruce, and luckily for him horny Bruce is in a sharing kind of mood, and makes this lucky cutie’s wet dream come true!
title: Get Your Dick Outta My Son - Part 1
